ProblemSolution.title: The Challenges You Face vs. The Nuqta Solution
ProblemSolution.problem1: Struggling to reach the right audience?
ProblemSolution.solution1: Nuqta connects you directly with the Arab community in Istanbul actively looking for events.
ProblemSolution.solution2: Centralize your presence on a dedicated platform built for discovery.
ProblemSolution.solution3: Streamlined ticketing and reservation tools designed for your needs.

WhyNuqta.title: Why Elite Event Organizers Choose Nuqta
WhyNuqta.subtitle: Stop struggling with scattered tools. Discover how we solve your real problems.
WhyNuqta.reason1_desc: We put your event in front of 5,000+ active Arab users in Turkey actively searching for new experiences.
WhyNuqta.reason2_desc: Fully automated system sends booking confirmations and reminders in both Arabic and English, and manages attendance lists for you.
WhyNuqta.reason3_desc: Exclusive review system; only those who actually attended the event can review, protecting your brand from random ratings.

reason1.problem_desc: You spend hours marketing on Facebook and Instagram, but your events only reach the same small circle. Competitors fill venues while you struggle to fill seats.
reason1.agitate: The problem? You're looking for attendees in the wrong places. General platforms are full of people who will never show up.
reason1.solution_title: Direct, targeted reach to 5,000+ active users
reason1.solution_desc: We put your event in front of 5,000+ active Arab users in Turkey actually looking for experiences like yours. Not random browsers‚Äîan audience ready to book.

reason2.problem_desc: Every booking turns into a long conversation. 'Did you receive the payment?' 'What's the address?' 'What time?' Same questions, 50 times. Your messages are drowning in chaos.
reason2.agitate: And at the last minute? Chasing unpaid bookings, sending manual reminders, and hoping no one forgets to attend. This isn't work‚Äîit's an administrative nightmare.
reason2.solution_title: Goodbye manual work: Full bilingual automation
reason2.solution_desc: Our system automatically sends booking confirmations and reminders in Arabic and English. Generates attendance lists with one click. Tracks payments in one dashboard. You just create the event‚Äîwe handle the rest.

reason3.problem_desc: You built your reputation through months of hard work. Then a competitor leaves a fake one-star review that destroys everything. Or worse‚Äîsomeone angry who didn't even attend.
reason3.agitate: One bad review is enough to turn away dozens of potential customers. And you're completely helpless because other platforms allow anyone to review‚Äîeven those who never bought a ticket.
reason3.solution_title: Protected reputation: Only actual attendees can review
reason3.solution_desc: Our verified system only allows attendees who actually showed up to write reviews. Zero fake reviews, zero competitors sabotaging your reputation. Every review is authentic from a real participant.

Testimonials.t1_quote: Nuqta changed the game for our workshops. We used to struggle to fill seats, now we're fully booked weeks in advance.
Testimonials.t2_quote: The platform is incredibly easy to use. I can focus on my event quality rather than worrying about marketing logistics.

t1.before: I was managing 50+ booking confirmations via WhatsApp for every workshop. Every booking turned into back-and-forth negotiations.
t1.after: After using Nuqta for 3 months, my attendance grew by 40% and I save 15 hours per event.
t1.result: I can now focus on creating amazing experiences instead of administrative tasks.
t1.author: Sarah M.

t2.before: Endless WhatsApp groups and complex Excel spreadsheets. Everything was scattered and chaotic.
t2.after: With Nuqta, everything is in one place. The bilingual system handles everything automatically.

t2.author: Mona K.

t3.before: I was worried about fake reviews. Competitors left bad reviews that damaged my reputation.
t3.after: Nuqta's verified review system changed everything. Now only actual attendees can review.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about managing events on Nuqta
FAQ.q1: How is Nuqta different from WhatsApp groups?
FAQ.a1: WhatsApp groups require you to manage every booking manually, chase payment screenshots, and spend hours following up. Nuqta automates all of this: professional booking system, bilingual email confirmations, automatic attendance lists, and an integrated dashboard. Saves an average of 10-15 hours per event. Plus, we put you in front of 5,000+ active users looking for events‚Äîsomething a private group can't do.
FAQ.q2: What if I only organize events occasionally?
FAQ.a2: Perfect! Our Starter plan is completely free for one active event. You can use it for your first event, pause it, and come back when you're ready for the next one. No monthly fees if you only organize one event at a time. When you need more, upgrading is easy and you can downgrade again anytime.
FAQ.q3: Do I need to know Turkish to use Nuqta?
FAQ.a3: Not at all! The entire platform is in Arabic. All attendee emails are automatically sent in both Arabic and English‚Äîno manual translation needed. Even if you don't speak Turkish, you can manage professional events for the Arab community in Turkey with ease.
FAQ.q4: How do attendees find my events?
FAQ.a4: Your event is automatically displayed on Nuqta's discovery page, visited by 5,000+ active Arab users monthly in Turkey. Plus, you get a custom public page you can share on Instagram, Facebook, and your own channels. Our system includes optimized SEO, so your events appear when people search for Arab activities in Istanbul. Nuqta works as both a marketing platform and management tool.
FAQ.q5: What happens to my data if I cancel my subscription?
FAQ.a5: Your data is always yours. You can export all attendee information, sales, and reviews anytime from your dashboard. If you cancel, we keep your data for 90 days (in case you want to come back), then securely delete it upon request. There's no data lock-in‚Äîyou always have full control and the ability to leave at any moment without losing your information.
FAQ.q6: Do I need technical knowledge to use Nuqta?
FAQ.a6: Not at all! Nuqta is designed to be user-friendly. You can create and manage events in minutes without any technical skills. Our platform handles all the complexity for you.
FAQ.q7: How does the bilingual system work?
FAQ.a7: All emails and notifications are automatically sent in both Arabic and English to your attendees. You only need to enter your event details once, and we handle the bilingual communication.
FAQ.q8: What payment methods can I accept?
FAQ.a8: You can accept payments via bank transfer in Turkey. Attendees submit payment proof through the platform, and you can verify and manage all bookings from your dashboard.
FAQ.q9: How does the verified review system work?
FAQ.a9: Only attendees who actually attended your event can leave reviews. This prevents fake reviews and ensures your brand reputation is protected with authentic feedback from real participants.
FAQ.q10: Can I try Nuqta before committing to a paid plan?
FAQ.a10: Yes! Our Starter plan is completely free and includes 1 active event with all features. You can test the platform's full capabilities before upgrading to a paid plan.
FAQ.q11: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
FAQ.a11: Yes, absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime from your dashboard with one click. No long-term contracts or cancellation fees. If you upgrade, you get additional features immediately. If you downgrade, the change takes effect at the beginning of your next billing cycle.

About.title: About Nuqta
About.subtitle: Connecting the heart of Istanbul's Arab community.
About.subtitle_rich: Connecting the heart of Istanbul's <highlight>Arab community</highlight>.
About.mission_desc: Nuqta is the heartbeat of the Arab community in Istanbul. We are a platform dedicated to bridging cultures, fostering connections, and centralizing the vibrant events and services that make this city home to so many.
About.story_desc: Since our inception, Nuqta has aimed to provide a trusted source for discovering workshops, galleries, bazaars, and community gatherings. We believe that by providing professional tools to organizers and a seamless discovery experience for users, we can help our community thrive together in Istanbul.
About.name_desc: In Arabic, 'Nuqta' (ŸÜŸÇÿ∑ÿ©) means 'point' or 'dot'. We see ourselves as the meeting point ‚Äî the central dot on the map where everyone comes together to start something new.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out with any questions about the platform or partnership opportunities.
Contact.success_msg: Thank you! We will get back to you soon.
Contact.partner_cta: Have a specific idea or partnership in mind? We'd love to hear from you. Expect a reply within 24 hours.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.s1_desc: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, register for an event, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, password, and information about the events you organize or attend.
Privacy.s2_desc: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including to process event registrations, provide customer support, and send you technical notices and security alerts.
Privacy.s3_desc: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy, such as when you register for an event and we share necessary details with the event organizer to facilitate your attendance.
Privacy.s4_desc: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings or by contacting us directly.
